short_summary: Request for proposal to supply and repair existing storage racking systems.
description: Canada is seeking proposals from qualified Offerors to replace and repair the current storage pallet racking systems to 14 Wing Greenwood, Department of National Defence.
full_summary:
Government of Canada
Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC)
(Bilingual)
## Tender Application for Pallet Racking
### Tender Reference No.:
WS4290718617 - Document 4429844379
### Solicitation No.:
WS4290718617
### Tender Title:
Replacement and Repair of Pallet Racking Systems at 14 Wing Greenwood
### Tender Description:
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking proposals from qualified contractors to replace and repair the existing storage pallet racking systems at 14 Wing Greenwood. 
### Tender Details
* **Tender Deadline:** February 22nd, 2024, 14:00 EST (Vous devez soumettre votre soumission avant la date et l’heure de clôture spécifiés dans les conditions de l’appel d’offres)
* **Publication Date:** February 5th, 2024
* **Contract Date:** Expected Contract Start Date: December 18th, 2023. No end date specified.
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Danny Arseneau
	+ Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
	+ Email: [Danny.Arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:Daniel.Arseneau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
	+ Note: Please see the official government tender notice for contact details.
* **Notice URL:** https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18708398?extsite=MTg3MDgzOThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Background Information**
The procurement process for this tender is publicly available on the official government tender notice. Contractors interested in participating must formally sign in to the account of the respective company in order to access information made available. The specific details listed above belong to these documents.


Tender Documents:
Request for Proposal Document
RFP Document File Description
Draft Agreement Document File Description

Tenders must be mailed via email or sent via a secure channel.
Tenderers must include within the document “submission receipt confirmation” for ensuring efforts in verification and review process that occur at the bidding stage ensuring proper flow of information to the DND Officials by developing “addendum accounting process indexes findings” while granting timely improvements in elevating requesting businesses to send pertinent information the investigation confirms potential contract length
